document.full_text: paul casey of britain shot an impeccable seven-under-par 64 to grab the early lead in the first round of the transitions championship at innisbrook on thursday.
document.title: casey takes early two-shot lead after flawless 64
lines_and_colors: paul casey of britain shot an impeccable seven-under-par 64 to grab the early lead in the first round of the transitions championship at innisbrook on thursday.
